column1: Totes for Hope Hygiene Donation Drive
column4: Totes of Hope is a community service program from the American Red Cross that provides backpacks filled with essential items to homeless and at-risk veterans. Each tote offers basic daily necessities and a reminder that their service and sacrifices are not forgotten. The program helps veterans connected through VA Medical Centers, shelters, and local outreach organizations, supporting the Red Cross mission to care for service members, veterans, and their families.  3 items = 1 hr, 2 hr cap.  Each tote includes personal care and comfort items such as soap, shampoo, deodorant, toothbrushes, shaving supplies, socks, gloves, bottled water, snacks, and small comfort items like puzzle books or playing cards. These items help veterans maintain their health, dignity, and comfort as they work toward stability.
